amendment.description: Amendments en bloc: (1) extend the Farmable Wetlands Pilot Program to all states; (2) require a GAO study to determine how producer income would be affected by updating yield bases; and (3) create an interagency task force on agricultural competition.
amendment.purpose: Amendments No. 57, 58, and 59 printed in the Congressional Record.

action.text: On agreeing to the Thune amendments (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
